amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to require regional directors to transmit the Notice of Election at the same time as the Direction of Election and require such notice to be transmitted electronically when possible.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-392 to require regional directors to transmit the Notice of Election at the same time as the Direction of Election and require such notice to be transmitted electronically when possible.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Vargas.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Vargas amendment (A013) Agreed to by voice vote.
